channel.title: Extract on Bas-Man's Ponderings
channel.description: Recent content in Extract on Bas-Man's Ponderings

item.description: Extract and decode “Subject” from email. Things to note: This function takes an list of tuples. This is because the email module returns a list of tuples when you call get() This code only handles the case where the subject in completely contained on on a single line. Hence the use of [0] at the end of the decode_header. This will need to be changed if your subject is broken over multiple lines.
